name: jsnetworkx
description: A port of the Python graph library NetworkX to JavaScript

scripts.build:node: rm -rf node/ && node scripts/build-node.js jsnx/ node/
scripts.build:node:dev: rm -rf node/ && node scripts/build-node.js --dev jsnx/ node/
scripts.build:browser: (export BUNDLE=jsnetworkx.js; rm -f $BUNDLE && { 6to5-runtime; browserify jsnx/browser.js -s jsnx; } | uglifyjs -cmo $BUNDLE)
scripts.build:browser:dev: (export BUNDLE=jsnetworkx-dev.js; rm -f $BUNDLE && { 6to5-runtime; NODE_ENV=dev browserify jsnx/browser.js -ds jsnx; } > $BUNDLE)
scripts.watch:browser: (export BUNDLE=jsnetworkx-dev.js; rm -f $BUNDLE && 6to5-runtime > runtime.js && NODE_ENV=dev watchify jsnx/browser.js -vds jsnx -o $BUNDLE)
scripts.test: npm run build:node:dev && mocha --ui exports -R progress -r './mocha/setup' `find node/ -name *-test.js`
scripts.cover: npm run build:node && istanbul cover _mocha -x '**/__tests__/**' -x 'mocha/*' -- --ui exports -R progress -r './mocha/setup' `find node/ -name *-test.js`
